ochr-ctp-grouping._comment:
This entity represents the functions of terminating 
			and/or originating a link connection in the OCh layer 
			network. This entity supports a reduced functionality, 
			i.e. does not support OCh overhead. The combining of the 
			unidirectional sink and source function forms a 
			bidirectional function.

input.data-tooltip:
This attribute indicates the directionality of the
termination point. Valid values are sink, source,
and bidirectional. This attribute is read-only.
